title: Immunity Boost - Revive Essential Oils
author: Name
description: This is our version of Young Living Thieves®. See other Young Living® dupes. REVIVE Immunity Boost is our best selling blend & the blend with the most 5 Star Reviews! REVIVE Immunity Boost is a proprietary blend of Clove, Lemon, Cinnamon Bark, Eucalyptus, and Rosemary Essential Oils.
cleaned_text: People Love us 26 reviews for Immunity Boost We love REVIVE Essential Oils and think you will too. We're so confident, we offer free returns. Simply return your opened or unopened bottles for a full refund within 100 days of purchase, no questions asked. We pay the cost of return shipping too.
